promptPrefix:
I'm going to type in two words: [research area], [research results].
Make a sentence using these two words. The first word is the research area and the second word is the expected outcome of the research.
[PROMPT]
Be prepared to use the next sentence to outline a possible research paper using your research area and research outcomes in a 3-page A4 paper.
Please answer in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Writing with [research area], [research results].
